short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a notification after specific interval set by the user as a reminder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A must have if you spend too much time on YouTube and need a reminder for a diversion. Set the timer in extensions options and continue wandering on the internet. GameHub Notifier will send you a toast notification that can help you refocus.
